go_data.justification: SNAP-25 forms a four-helix bundle SNARE complex with Syntaxin1 and VAMP-2, which provides mechanical force for membrane fusion.
SNAP-25 is anchored to the presynaptic membrane.
SNAP-25 is fundamental to neurotransmitter release as part of the SNARE complex.
The SNARE complex, including SNAP-25, provides mechanical force for membrane fusion to occur during vesicle exocytosis.
SNAP-25 interacts with critical partners, including Munc18a and Syntaxin1, for SNARE complex formation and exocytosis.
